Articles.Content:
Hey guys. Sorry if a topic like this has been made before, but I checked 4 pages back and didn't see a place to post this specific themed spacecraft.

I'm making a replica of the Apollo program missions on my 0.24 career. I've simply stayed inside Kerbin's SOI and finished part-testing contracts to raise funds, collect science, and unlock everything I thought I needed. No space exploration whatsoever. I'd like to share my first rocket payload I intend to send to another celestial body.

I modeled it after the Apollo series of Lunar Modules. I also have the Command Module/Service Module but the lander is the interesting part I think.

The thing weighs a lot. I'm going to have to Kerbalize the Saturn V rocket in order to get this thing on the moon, but it will be worth the money. I think...

EDIT: A little side note. Before you guys give me too too hard a time since I obviously part clipped; only aesthetic details were part clipped. All of the guts and practical equipment is legit. No 100 fuel tanks inside of each other or any funny business such as that. I'll be lucky if this thing can make it off the Mun!

Edited August 2, 2014 by Mister Kerman

HI! But yes there are so many of these threads now. Do a page search first. its much quicker.

Interesting lander too.

That's a good tip for next time. The latest one is buried at least 5 pages back. I stopped digging because I figured anything buried that deep wasn't worth digging up. I didn't realize there were lots of these topics!

I mostly want to see some replica shuttles, satellites, or even Lunar Modules like mine.

Edited July 31, 2014 by Mister Kerman

That's a good tip for next time. The latest one is buried at least 5 pages back. I stopped digging because I figured anything buried that deep wasn't worth digging up. I didn't realize there were lots of these topics!

I mostly want to see some replica shuttles, satellites, or even Lunar Modules like mine.

I am working on a replica shuttle and replica spaceX mct (found out what it would look like after trying 20 different searches and doing each one 5 times http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/2014/03/spacex-advances-drive-mars-rocket-raptor-power/ ) so far I have made a falcon nine, heavy, and many other things that are original. Your Lander is better than my replicas of rockets.

Any screenshots? I really like the idea of space shuttles. I have to figure out a stock method to making a cargo bay if I'm gonna make a shuttle. I'm having major problems getting this lander to work. This is what I've got so far.

The Showcase of showcases. A mighty useful thread that should be stickied at the top of this subforum and looked at before posting.

Rune. Otherwise, damn fine LM.

Oh wow. I'll definitely take a look at that. I suppose someone may as well lock this thread then. Thanks for the link!

Also I agree it should be stickied. Mods/admins, please take that into consideration so someone else doesn't waste time making/unmaking a thread.

Edited August 2, 2014 by Mister Kerman

Wow, I actually found someone else who admits to bloody part clipping!

I swear, everyone denies it, but it's not cheating until you clip anything useful. I don't see the shame in using it to make awesome builds like this. Good work!

Closed by OP's request.

By the way, if you want to call our attention to an issue like this, rather than wait for one of us to run across it, you can contact us about it here.
